Pretty good video quality, but the worst englisg subs ever.
Why write the action in subs when someone giggles, laughs or footsteps when these are universally recognized?
Just focus on language versus effects.
The subs only include about 1/50th of what's being said.
Thanks anyway for the effort. Better subs will show up sooner or later.

This is the STUPIDEST movie I've seen in the last 20 yrs.  After the 1st hr, I had to fast fwd and I'm so glad I did :-)  Aside from the crappy subtitles and 2nd audio track (which I found way too late), half the movie is about a stick from behind a curtain hitting idiots who walk up to it like mosquitoes to a zapper.  NEVER AGAIN!!!
The trailer looked pretty cool but the movie not worth it AV 9/9 thanks anyway
